group.title: Shadowrun
group.creator_credit: Data East USA and Beam Software

results.title: What women want
results.brief_description: Nick Marshall (Mel Gibson) is a real ladies man. Raised by his mother, a Las Vegas showgirl, he has a somewhat distorted perception of what women really want, and an enormous ego. When he is passed over for an executive position in the advertising agency for a woman his chauvinistic attitude worsens. A freak accident while trying to brainstorm ideas for a new advertising campaign, leaves Nick with the ability to hear what women think. Amazed by his new talent Nick seeks the help of a therapist (Bette Midler) who suggests he think of it as a gift and not a curse, and to use this to his advantage. Nick sets his sights on Darcy McGuire (Helen Hunt), the new creative director in the agency. At first his plan works, and he undermines Darcy at every opportunity, until he realises Darcy has feelings for him, and that he feels the same way about her. Cast also includes Marisa Tomei, Mark Feurstein, Lauren Holly, Valerie Perrine, Delta Bourke and Alan Alda

results.title: Friends of the family
results.creator_credit: Yossi Abolafia, David Verrall, Derek Lamb and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: An animated children’s film that illustrates the different projects that UNICEF uses its funds for. Two young children suddenly find that their own comfortable home surroundings have disappeared and that they are in a very poor village that does not even have a water pump. UNICEF comes to the rescue! Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.

results.title: Ju dou
results.creator_credit: Yang Feng-Liang, Zhang Yimou, Yasuyoshi Tokuma, Jian Hu, Wenze Zhang, Takuma Shoten Publishing Company and China Film
results.brief_description: Ju Dou (Gong Li), the third wife of an impotent and abusive silk merchant Jinshan (Li Wei), finds herself seducing and ultimately falling in love with her husband’s nephew; a seemingly inevitable outcome of a loveless marriage. Jinshan’s abusive nature stems from his frustration at his wives’ inability to conceive (in reality he is sterile). Ju Dou feels this abuse when she too has trouble conceiving. Trouble develops when Ju Dou falls pregnant with her lover’s child, and an explosive situation develops as the child grows and begins to resemble the appearance of his natural father and not Jinshan. Cast includes Gong Li, Li Wei, and Li Baotian. In Mandarin with English subtitles. Banned by the Chinese Government, this film was nominated for an Academy Award for best foreign film, the first Chinese film to receive such a nomination.

results.title: The Tailor from Torzhok
results.creator_credit: Valentin Turkin, Yakov Protazanov and Mezhrabpom-Russ
results.brief_description:
A simple tailor from a rural village unexpectedly strikes it rich in Leningrad in this fast paced satirical comedy which was commissioned to publicise the state lottery. Also available on 16mm.

Credits: Director, Yakov Protazanov ; script, V. Turkin ; photography, P. Yermolov.
Cast: L. Deikun, I. Ilyinsky.

results.title: I See a dark stranger = The Adventuress
results.creator_credit: Thelma Connell, Frank Launder, Sidney Gilliat and Individual Pictures
results.brief_description: The shadowy world of German espionage in wartime Britain. Bridie Quilty has grown up in the west of Ireland under the influence of her father’s nationalism and becomes an innocent member of a German spy network. When she discovers secret plans for the D-Day landings - and falls in love with an English officer on leave - she faces her moment of truth on the Isle of Man in the climax of this atmospheric thriller. Stars Deborah Kerr, Trevor Howard and Raymond Huntley.
